thread.section_title: The Natural Sapphire Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Natural Sapphire Company | www.thenaturalsapphirecompany.com
thread.title: Kate P
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Kate P

author: Kate P
title: Kate P
text: I was having a hard time finding an engagement ring for myself that was simple, unique and had personal meaning. After endless searches for the perfect ring online and in person, I kept coming back to the "design your own ring" concept at The Natural Sapphire Company. I found the entire process incredibly simple and easy: from searching individual gems to the various settings, I could try endless combinations - and I loved the ability to see what the ring might actually look like using AutoCAD! Once I had an idea of what I might like, Caitlyn was responsive and helpful from start to finish, answering any additional questions we had. When the proposal actually happened and I got to see my ring in person, I knew it was perfect. It's exactly what I had envisioned and I am so incredibly happy I get to wear it every day. I absolutely LOVE it - thank you!
